Scriptal.Name: Set Variable To Random Number
Scriptal.Description: Updates a custom number-variable to a random number within a defined range.

Choice.Name: Variable
Choice.Description: The custom variable that the random value will be set to.

Choice.Name: From
Choice.Description: The lowest value that the random number can return.

Choice.Name: To
Choice.Description: The highest value that the random number can return.
